item.title: About
item.description: Specialist in Distributed Secure Systems Currently I am currently working as IT Security Analyst at Verimi with significant contribution to the security of the digital identity offered by Verimi. Specifically, I am involved in security-, risk- & workflow-analyses as well as technology & architecture security (e.g. vulnerability scans, coordination of pentests). Verimi is unique worldwide and offers the chance of a secure digital identity and the sovereignty over his own data.

item.title: CV
item.description: Professional Experience With specialization in secure distributed systemsI gained experiences coordination, analysis, research & development activities in French, German and international institutes, all being international & multicultural environments: Education 09 / 2013: Doctoral degree (conducted as French-German “cotutelle de these”) [manuscript] University of Passau (Germany) & INSA de Lyon (France) Award of Excellence 2013 (categorie: natural sciences) [press release (de)] [press release (fr)] Research domain: Reliable and secure peer-to-peer (P2P) systems; complex system analysis; game theory Title: Achieving collaboration in distributed systems deployed over selfish nodes - a Publish/Subscribe case study The PhD was conducted in the cotutelle de thèse program, a binational supervision between the Grande École INSA de Lyon (France) and the University of Passau (Germany), financed by a 3-year grant, currently also working as research associate at the University of Passau.
